channel.title: Making words appear on quest tab 317 delta?

item.title: Making words appear on quest tab 317 delta?
item.dc:creator: @owwch_u_died owwch u died
item.description:
@owwch_u_died wrote:

Thanks alot mista, Barrage is the first thing on my quest journal instead of black knights fortress.

Howd you know the “7332” code?

Btw how can i delete the rest of the names in the quest journal? The only words i want is like “barrage” “veng” “pickup”

item.description:

In your textHandler class.

c.sendQuest(“Barrage”, 7332);

item.title: Making words appear on quest tab 317 delta?
item.dc:creator: @owwch_u_died owwch u died
item.description:
@owwch_u_died wrote:

Thanks alot, but thing is, when i finally was able to fix it and open the tab, there was nothing to click on in the tab?

So i added “quest journal” interface into it, and clicked on “black knights fortress” and the ID for that is 28164.

I cant find that case anywhere. All i wanna do is put words into the tab? Or how do i change a quest name into "“barrage”?

Thanks!!

you just made the sidebar appear, click on the text in there and a button id should show up in cmd, thats the button id for your clickingmost.java or actionbuttons.java

item.source: Making words appear on quest tab 317 delta?

item.title: Making words appear on quest tab 317 delta?
item.dc:creator: @owwch_u_died owwch u died
item.description:
@owwch_u_died wrote:

Hello, I go my quest tab working, it was not working before when i clicked on it.

When i couldnt open the quest tab when i clicked i went into client.java and found “quest tab”

The code that WAS in there was setSidebarInterface(2, -1); // quest tab

So i changed it to setSidebarInterface(2, 1789); // quest tab

Then it worked after i added the “1789” i could open the tab and its blank.

Now, from there how do i add words into it? ex. “::barrage” So people can type their own commands in, just helping them know which ones are which.

and also do i need a special case for it or something, where do i add it and how? Thanks.

setSidebarInterface(0, 2423); // attack tab
setSidebarInterface(1, 3917); // skills tab
setSidebarInterface(2, 1789); // quest tab
setSidebarInterface(3, 3213); // backpack tab
setSidebarInterface(4, 1644); // items wearing tab
setSidebarInterface(5, 5608); // pray tab
if (playerAncientMagics == 0) {
setSidebarInterface(6, 1151);
}
if (playerAncientMagics == 1) {
setSidebarInterface(6, 12855);
}
if (playerAncientMagics == 2) {
setSidebarInterface(6, 18787);
}
setSidebarInterface(7, -1); // clan chat
setSidebarInterface(8, 5065); // friend
setSidebarInterface(9, 5715); // ignore
setSidebarInterface(10, 2449); // logout tab
setSidebarInterface(11, 4445); // wrench tab
setSidebarInterface(12, 147); // run tab
setSidebarInterface(13, -1); // harp tab
// add player commands…

Read full topic
